| HistoryText             = The New Revengers were a group of supervillains assembled by the [[Reed Richards (Earth-1610)|Maker]] as a strike force to directly confront [[Avengers Idea Mechanics (Earth-616)|A.I.M.]]'s [[New Avengers (A.I.M.) (Earth-616)|New Avengers]] in his attempt to take them over.{{r|New Avengers Vol 4 12}}

When A.I.M. was distracted confronting [[Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division (Earth-616)|S.H.I.E.L.D.]], the Maker took the chance to send the New Revengers after them. The Maker and [[Skar]] subdued [[Aikku Jokinen (Earth-616)|Pod]] and attacked [[Toni Ho (Earth-616)|Toni Ho]],{{r|New Avengers Vol 4 13}} [[Organo-Mechanic Nexus-Iterated Techno-Radical Organizational Networked Intelligent Computer Unity System (Earth-616)|O.M.N.I.T.R.O.N.I.C.U.S.]] sealed off [[Roberto Da Costa (Earth-616)|Bobbi da Costa]] in his office and fired his defense systems at him, [[Angela del Toro (Earth-616)|Angela del Toro]] confronted her aunt and fellow [[White Tiger]], [[Ava Ayala (Earth-616)|Ava Ayala]], and the remaining members attacked several sections of [[Avenger Base Two]] and its staff.{{r|New Avengers Vol 4 14}}

Toni Ho managed to defend herself from Skar and even kill him after donning her [[Rescue Armor]], Bobbi escaped from O.M.N.I.T.R.O.N.I.C.U.S.' grasp with the help of [[Warlock (Technarch) (Earth-616)|Warlock]], and Ayala broke Angela free from the Tiger God's and the [[Hand (Earth-616)|Hand]]'s evil influence, getting her to join A.I.M.'s side.{{r|New Avengers Vol 4 15}} When the remaining active New Revenges and the Maker attacked the White Tigers, they were assisted by the New Avengers and other members of A.I.M. who were returning from a rescue mission. Finding himself outnumbered, the Maker decided to flee and leave the New Revengers to keep fighting until their eventual and collective defeat at the hands of the heroes.{{r|New Avengers Vol 4 16}}
